name: Slime (itch) (iDunnyX)
description:
A Gameboy themed 2D Platformer that brings you back to the roots of early gaming. As the brave Retro you have to make your way through the Slime Kingdom and over throw the Slime King. Make it through the 3 stages of the Kingdom and drop the King!

Move Player:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys

Restart Level:

R Key

This is my first time "Completing" a game since I started Game Dev. about two weeks ago. This game is for WGJ 166. http://www.weeklygamejam.com/ Theme: Roots All Art and Programing was done by myself. :D
